data.title: CineKink film festival flaunts sex on the big screen: 'It's hard to tell what America is ready for' â€“ video
data.meta_description: The CineKink film festival is a celebration of all things sexual and kinky. From arthouse dramas to porn, the films explore sex and sexuality on screen. Zoe Margolis speaks to some of this year's directors and the festival curator about America's appetite for sex in film
data.text:
This article is more than 10 years old

Now in its 11th year, the CineKink film festival is a celebration of all things sexual and kinky. From arthouse dramas to porn, the films explore sex and sexuality on screen. Zoe Margolis speaks to some of this year's directors and the CineKink co-founder and director about America's appetite for sex in film
